mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT e.emp_no, e.email, e.password, e.name, e.img FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_roles er ON e.emp_no = er.emp_no WHERE e.email = #{email}
SELECT r.role_name FROM employee_roles er JOIN roles r ON er.role_id = r.role_id JOIN employees e ON er.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE e.email = #{email}
